item.description:
Last class for the season! If you have ever thought about going raw - summer is the time. Come learn some simple and tasty recipes that you can make at home on your own and meet some new friends! The commitment to real food from this evolving this group extends beyond the mere physical into the sphere of spiritual health. I am so inspired and so grateful! Fall classes will continue starting on alternating Thursdays on September 6th and details for how to apply for our co-op will be available soon.

This week we will be making:

Superfood Smoothie

Kombucha

Alkalizing Superfood Live Soup

Live Lasagna

Live Dressing

Veggie Tempura

Raw Chocolate Pineapple Treats

We will start with our MamaLicious Superfood Smoothie & discuss the various Superfoods we will be featuring and then move to our work stations. Lunch will be Live Soup, Live Lasagna, Arugula Salad topped with Tempura Veggies & Brazil Nut Turmeric Dressing.

Investment: $75, includes lunch.

If you would like to order food to take home please let me know in advance. We will also be reviewing available items through the co-op and placing orders for nuts and superfoods.! ox
item.name: Sprout Mama Activation! Hands-on Raw Food Class
